page.title: 20HOME LIFE
page.content: play football. I am in the school team and I also play for a Sunday team called KC Dynamos. After school I sometimes play badminton at the local playbarn, and round my area I play cricket and tennis. I can swim and I have a certificate for swimming 150 metres. Next year I shall be a 4th year and then I shall go on to Comprehensive School. When I leave I want to be a lorry driver like my dad working round London. I don't watch much television because I would rather be out playing. We've got a caravan and we often go to a caravan site near Cambridge. This year we are going to take it to the Isle of Wight." {Dictated by Raymond Gates.
